svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 9 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 9, 2023" date: "2023-09-09"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Testing continues on
devnet-8 Devnet-9 planned for Tuesday September 19 EIP4844 blobs per block: big block analysis
presented, no changes to 3/6 (target/max) yet Proposed addition to Dencun (open for community input):
max epoch churn limit as a short term fix to validator set size growth, discuss on ACDE whether to
include in Dencun
â€¢ Testing continues on devnet-8
Testing continues on devnet-8
â€¢ Devnet-9 planned for Tuesday September 19
Devnet-9 planned for Tuesday September 19
â€¢ EIP4844 blobs per block: big block analysis presented, no changes to 3/6 (target/max) yet
EIP4844 blobs per block: big block analysis presented, no changes to 3/6 (target/max) yet
â€¢ Proposed addition to Dencun (open for community input): max epoch churn limit as a short term fix to
validator set size growth, discuss on ACDE whether to include in Dencun
Proposed addition to Dencun (open for community input): max epoch churn limit as a short term fix to
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.4% is very close to breaching risky 33% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.4% is very close to breaching risky 33% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly
cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm & Lighthouse over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm & Lighthouse over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm & Lighthouse over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Layer 1
â€¢ Mempool dumpster : exports transactions from EL node transaction pools in Parquet & CSV format
Mempool dumpster : exports transactions from EL node transaction pools in Parquet & CSV format
â€¢ MEV-Boost: Strong builder identity : proposal to combat imposter attacks (Titan had an imposter)
Prestwich: proposers & builders could collude on gas limit to minimize base fees
MEV-Boost:
â€¢ Strong builder identity : proposal to combat imposter attacks (Titan had an imposter)
Strong builder identity : proposal to combat imposter attacks (Titan had an imposter)
â€¢ Prestwich: proposers & builders could collude on gas limit to minimize base fees
â€¢ Whisk devnet : proof of concept Single Secret Leader Election (SSLE) on fork of Lighthouse + Geth
Whisk devnet : proof of concept Single Secret Leader Election (SSLE) on fork of Lighthouse + Geth
For Stakers
â€¢ Staking directory : adds info for liquid staking on network share & self-limit pledges
Client releases for HoleÅ¡ky testnet
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lighthouse v4.4.1 Lodestar v1.11.1 Teku v23.9.0

Lighthouse v4.4.1

Lodestar v1.11.1

Teku v23.9.0

â€¢ Besu v23.7.2
Besu v23.7.2

Erigon v2.49.0
â€¢ Otterscan v2.0.0 alpha : adds in-node token indexers
Research
â€¢ Terenceâ€™s EIP4844+ (ideas for extending blobs after Dencun upgrade): erase code to increase
target/max blobs to 6/12 and apply data availability sampling
Terenceâ€™s EIP4844+ (ideas for extending blobs after Dencun upgrade): erase code to increase target/max
blobs to 6/12 and apply data availability sampling
â€¢ PeerDAS : data availability sampling approach reusing p2p components to scale without DHT
PeerDAS : data availability sampling approach reusing p2p components to scale without DHT
â€¢ Barnabe: inclusion list games , builders may be incentivised to stuff blocks and proposers may try
to bribe/extort each other
Barnabe: inclusion list games , builders may be incentivised to stuff blocks and proposers may try to
bribe/extort each other
Layer 2
â€¢ Base delay in block production for 45 minutes
Base delay in block production for 45 minutes
â€¢ Barry Whitehatâ€™s Plasma Free proposal: free transactions but if data is unavailable users need to
make a forced transaction (users online assumption)
Barry Whitehatâ€™s Plasma Free proposal: free transactions but if data is unavailable users need to make
a forced transaction (users online assumption)
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs EIP7514 : Add max epoch churn limit
EIPs
â€¢ EIP7514 : Add max epoch churn limit
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7507 : Multi-user NFT extension (ERC721 extension) ERC7508 : Dynamic
onchain token attributes repository ERC7509 : Entity component system ERC7510 : Cross-contract
hierarchical NFT (ERC721 extension) ERC7511 : Minimal proxy contract with PUSH0 ERC7512 : Onchain
representation for audits ERC7513 : NFT-bound modularized contract (ERC1155 extension)
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7507 : Multi-user NFT extension (ERC721 extension)
ERC7507 : Multi-user NFT extension (ERC721 extension)
â€¢ ERC7508 : Dynamic onchain token attributes repository
ERC7508 : Dynamic onchain token attributes repository

ERC7509 : Entity component system

ERC7510 : Cross-contract hierarchical NFT (ERC721 extension)

ERC7511 : Minimal proxy contract with PUSH0
â€¢ ERC7512 : Onchain representation for audits
ERC7512 : Onchain representation for audits

ERC7513 : NFT-bound modularized contract (ERC1155 extension)
Check out web3 Builders Podcast
Check out Will and Evanâ€™s interviews with the honest actors of Ethereum: Austin Griffith , Ameen
Soleimani , and Vitalik Buterin (part 1).
Or listen to our weekly news show. On this weekâ€™s episode : Lido attempting to add backdoor onchain
governance to Ethereum, Bitcoin mining adjustment and declining security budget, and Runeâ€™s
announcement of a far-off Maker appchain.
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry: Forge-std v1.6.1 : new cheat codes to get keys of a mapping, filesystem cheats & JSON
parsing Catapulta (Foundry deployment automation): abstracts RPC config & Etherscan keys, free during
alpha Solpretty : Solidity library for pretty printing numbers
Foundry:
â€¢ Forge-std v1.6.1 : new cheat codes to get keys of a mapping, filesystem cheats & JSON parsing
Forge-std v1.6.1 : new cheat codes to get keys of a mapping, filesystem cheats & JSON parsing

Catapulta (Foundry deployment automation): abstracts RPC config & Etherscan keys, free during alpha

Solpretty : Solidity library for pretty printing numbers
â€¢ RareSkills: gas optimization guide
RareSkills: gas optimization guide
â€¢ Guide to Vyper compilation pipeline
Guide to Vyper compilation pipeline
â€¢ Ape-roll : weiroll (operation-chaining/scripting language) client for Ape Framework
Ape-roll : weiroll (operation-chaining/scripting language) client for Ape Framework

ApeWorX cHaOSneT (beta): paid testnet service with simulated activity using bots
â€¢ Heimdall-rs v0.5.3 : increased decoding accuracy and adds flag to help decode transactions with
non-standard byte sizes
Heimdall-rs v0.5.3 : increased decoding accuracy and adds flag to help decode transactions with
â€¢ Privacy playgrounds (wiki): hidden information mechanics for onchain games
Privacy playgrounds (wiki): hidden information mechanics for onchain games
Security
â€¢ Stake (gambling) $41 million stolen from mainnet & sidechain hot wallets; FBI blames Lazarus
Stake (gambling) $41 million stolen from mainnet & sidechain hot wallets; FBI blames Lazarus
â€¢ GMBL Computer on Arbitrum ~$1 million exploit via referral system
GMBL Computer on Arbitrum ~$1 million exploit via referral system
â€¢ FloorDAO 40 ETH exploit via backlog of rebases
FloorDAO 40 ETH exploit via backlog of rebases
Ecosystem
â€¢ Paper on privacy pools (authors include Vitalik & Ameen Soleimani): users can prove regulatory
compliance without revealing their entire transaction history
Paper on privacy pools (authors include Vitalik & Ameen Soleimani): users can prove regulatory
â€¢ ERC4337 (account abstraction) grant recipients
ERC4337 (account abstraction) grant recipients
â€¢ Hackathon projects: ETHWarsaw and Ethcon Korea
Hackathon projects: ETHWarsaw and Ethcon Korea
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.8 to 88.9 gwei, with 15.7 gwei average Negative issuance
currently at 20.4 gwei 3.6k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 7.8 to 88.9 gwei, with 15.7 gwei average
â€¢ Negative issuance currently at 20.4 gwei
Negative issuance currently at 20.4 gwei
â€¢ 3.6k ETH net issuance this week
3.6k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1615-1653, currently $1635
ETHUSD : $1615-1653, currently $1635
â€¢ ETHBTC : 0.0627-0.0636, currently 0.0631 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : 0.0627-0.0636, currently 0.0631 (Flippening at ~0.16)

â€¢ USDC native on Optimism & Base
USDC native on Optimism & Base

Kain proposes Synthetix experiment with expansion , on Base with ETH collateral
â€¢ Kevin Owocki returning to Gitcoin
Kevin Owocki returning to Gitcoin
â€¢ Nouns DAO fork #0 started (fork explainer : enables 20%+ to exit their share of the treasury
together)
Nouns DAO fork #0 started (fork explainer : enables 20%+ to exit their share of the treasury together)
â€¢ TryENS : create a temporary ENS subdomain, expires after 48 hours
TryENS : create a temporary ENS subdomain, expires after 48 hours
â€¢ Hashmarks : fading SVG NFTs that require refreshing using the physical sculpture
Hashmarks : fading SVG NFTs that require refreshing using the physical sculpture
â€¢ Vaults.FYI : find the best yield (with or without farming incentives) for your assets
Vaults.FYI : find the best yield (with or without farming incentives) for your assets

â€¢ Crypto wealth report : 22 billionaires, 182 centi-millionaires & 88,200 millionaires

@evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
